title: Primary Key Type
description: Primary key generation strategy. 'auto-increment' uses sequential integers (1, 2, 3...), 'uuid' generates random unique identifiers, 'composite' uses multiple fields together.

specs.then: it should be unique within the parent collection
the system should prevent changes (read-only constraint)

specs.given: a client requests an entity by ID
specs.then: the entity should be retrieved successfully
